languages.text: "Это было бы неслыханным коварством для арбитра. Боюсь, что вы переоцениваете мою находчивость". {n}По лицу Соломона сложно оценить искренность его слов.{/n}
"That would be disgracefully devious for an Arbitrator. I'm afraid you are overestimating my ingenuity." {n}Solomorne's bearing makes it hard to gauge the sincerity of his words.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это было бы неслыханным коварством для арбитра. Боюсь, что вы переоцениваете мою находчивость". {n}По лицу Соломона сложно оценить искренность его слов.{/n}

"That would be disgracefully devious for an Arbitrator. I'm afraid you are overestimating my ingenuity." {n}Solomorne's bearing makes it hard to gauge the sincerity of his words.{/n}

languages.text: 「それはさすがに、アービトレイターとしてはあまりに狡猾すぎます。残念ながら、あなたは私の才知を過大評価しているようですね」{n}ソロモーンの態度からは、その言葉が本気かどうか判別しづらい。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That would be disgracefully devious for an Arbitrator. I'm afraid you are overestimating my ingenuity." {n}Solomorne's bearing makes it hard to gauge the sincerity of his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それはさすがに、アービトレイターとしてはあまりに狡猾すぎます。残念ながら、あなたは私の才知を過大評価しているようですね」{n}ソロモーンの態度からは、その言葉が本気かどうか判別しづらい。{/n}

languages.text: "Das wäre für einen Arbitrator auf ehrlose Weise verschlagen. Ich fürchte, Ihr überschätzt meinen Einfallsreichtum." {n}Solomornes Haltung macht es schwer, den Wahrheitsgehalt seiner Worte einzuschätzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That would be disgracefully devious for an Arbitrator. I'm afraid you are overestimating my ingenuity." {n}Solomorne's bearing makes it hard to gauge the sincerity of his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das wäre für einen Arbitrator auf ehrlose Weise verschlagen. Ich fürchte, Ihr überschätzt meinen Einfallsreichtum." {n}Solomornes Haltung macht es schwer, den Wahrheitsgehalt seiner Worte einzuschätzen.{/n}

languages.text: « Ce serait un stratagème honteusement sournois pour un arbitrator. J'ai bien peur que vous surestimiez mon ingéniosité. » {n}L'attitude de Solomorne ne vous permet pas de jauger la sincérité de ses paroles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That would be disgracefully devious for an Arbitrator. I'm afraid you are overestimating my ingenuity." {n}Solomorne's bearing makes it hard to gauge the sincerity of his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce serait un stratagème honteusement sournois pour un arbitrator. J'ai bien peur que vous surestimiez mon ingéniosité. » {n}L'attitude de Solomorne ne vous permet pas de jauger la sincérité de ses paroles.{/n}

languages.text: «Eso sería vergonzosamente taimado para un Arbitrator. Me temo que sobrestima mi ingenio». {n}La actitud de Solomorne te impide evaluar la sinceridad de sus palabras.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That would be disgracefully devious for an Arbitrator. I'm afraid you are overestimating my ingenuity." {n}Solomorne's bearing makes it hard to gauge the sincerity of his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Eso sería vergonzosamente taimado para un Arbitrator. Me temo que sobrestima mi ingenio». {n}La actitud de Solomorne te impide evaluar la sinceridad de sus palabras.{/n}

languages.text: “对法务官而言，这是非常卑劣的欺诈行为。恐怕你高估了我的聪明才智。”{n}仅凭索罗蒙的举止判断，你很难看出他说的到底是不是实话。{/n}
languages.original_text: "That would be disgracefully devious for an Arbitrator. I'm afraid you are overestimating my ingenuity." {n}Solomorne's bearing makes it hard to gauge the sincerity of his words.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “对法务官而言，这是非常卑劣的欺诈行为。恐怕你高估了我的聪明才智。”{n}仅凭索罗蒙的举止判断，你很难看出他说的到底是不是实话。{/n}

languages.text: "Bu dediğiniz, bir Yargıcı için utanç verici bir dalaveredir. Korkarım yaratıcılığımı abartıyorsunuz." {n}Solomorne'un duruşu, sözlerinin samimiyetini ölçmeyi zorlaştırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "That would be disgracefully devious for an Arbitrator. I'm afraid you are overestimating my ingenuity." {n}Solomorne's bearing makes it hard to gauge the sincerity of his words.{/n}
